sentences.sContent: Opposition leaders described the government’s plans as ‘farcical’.
sentences.sCn: 反对党领导人说政府的计划就像“一场闹剧”。

synos.tran: 滑稽的；闹剧的；引人发笑的

remMethod.val: 来自farce (n. 笑剧， 闹剧)

trans.tranCn: 滑稽的；闹剧的；引人发笑的
trans.tranOther: a situation or event that is farcical is very silly and badly organized
